verses.text: And it came to pass, when men began to multiply on the face of the earth, and daughters were born unto them,

crossRefs.note: Be fruitful and multiply
Sons and daughters of Adam

verses.text: That the sons of God saw the daughters of men that they were fair; and they took them wives of all which they chose.

crossRefs.note: Sons of God before the LORD
Marrying and giving in marriage before the flood

verses.text: And the LORD said, My spirit shall not always strive with man, for that he also is flesh: yet his days shall be an hundred and twenty years.

crossRefs.note: I will not contend for ever
Longsuffering of God in the days of Noah

verses.text: There were giants in the earth in those days; and also after that, when the sons of God came in unto the daughters of men, and they bare children to them, the same became mighty men which were of old, men of renown.

crossRefs.note: Giants (Nephilim) mentioned
Angels which kept not their first estate (interpretive link)

verses.text: And GOD saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth, and that every imagination of the thoughts of his heart was only evil continually.

crossRefs.note: Imagination of man's heart is evil from his youth
The heart is deceitful above all things

verses.text: And it repented the LORD that he had made man on the earth, and it grieved him at his heart.

crossRefs.note: It repenteth me that I have set up Saul
Grieve not the Holy Spirit of God

verses.text: And the LORD said, I will destroy man whom I have created from the face of the earth; both man, and beast, and the creeping thing, and the fowls of the air; for it repenteth me that I have made them.

crossRefs.note: Every living substance will I destroy
I will consume man and beast

verses.text: But Noah found grace in the eyes of the LORD.

crossRefs.note: Thou hast found grace in my sight
Noah moved with fear, prepared an ark

verses.text: These are the generations of Noah: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.

crossRefs.note: Enoch walked with God
Noah, Daniel, and Job—righteous men

verses.text: And Noah begat three sons, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

crossRefs.note: Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth
Of them was the whole earth overspread

verses.text: The earth also was corrupt before God, and the earth was filled with violence.

crossRefs.note: They are all gone aside
Because of men's blood, and for the violence

verses.text: And God looked upon the earth, and, behold, it was corrupt; for all flesh had corrupted his way upon the earth.

crossRefs.note: They have corrupted themselves
All have sinned

verses.text: And God said unto Noah, The end of all flesh is come before me; for the earth is filled with violence through them; and, behold, I will destroy them with the earth.

crossRefs.note: Indignation upon all nations
The world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished

verses.text: Make thee an ark of gopher wood; rooms shalt thou make in the ark, and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch.

crossRefs.note: Ark of bulrushes daubed with pitch
Prepared an ark to the saving of his house

verses.text: And this is the fashion which thou shalt make it of: The length of the ark shall be three hundred cubits, the breadth of it fifty cubits, and the height of it thirty cubits.

crossRefs.note: Cubit as a measuring unit
Come thou and all thy house into the ark

verses.text: A window shalt thou make to the ark, and in a cubit shalt thou finish it above; and the door of the ark shalt thou set in the side thereof; with lower, second, and third stories shalt thou make it.

crossRefs.note: Noah opened the window of the ark
I am the door (typological link)

verses.text: And, behold, I, even I, do bring a flood of waters upon the earth, to destroy all flesh, wherein is the breath of life, from under heaven; and every thing that is in the earth shall die.

crossRefs.note: All flesh died that moved upon the earth
Cut down out of time, whose foundation was overflown with a flood

verses.text: But with thee will I establish my covenant; and thou shalt come into the ark, thou, and thy sons, and thy wife, and thy sons' wives with thee.

crossRefs.note: Covenant with Noah after the flood
They like Adam have transgressed the covenant (covenant theme)

verses.text: And of every living thing of all flesh, two of every sort shalt thou bring into the ark, to keep them alive with thee; they shall be male and female.

crossRefs.note: Clean by sevens, unclean by twos
Be fruitful and multiply (preservation)

verses.text: Of fowls after their kind, and of cattle after their kind, of every creeping thing of the earth after his kind, two of every sort shall come unto thee, to keep them alive.

crossRefs.note: After their kind
They went in two and two unto Noah into the ark

verses.text: And take thou unto thee of all food that is eaten, and thou shalt gather it to thee; and it shall be for food for thee, and for them.

crossRefs.note: Provision of food to man and animals
Ant prepares her meat in the summer

verses.text: Thus did Noah; according to all that God commanded him, so did he.

crossRefs.note: Noah did according unto all that the LORD commanded him
By faith… prepared an ark
